cyclone.name: MARCO
cyclone.current_location: about 395 mi SSE of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking north-northwest across the central Gulf of Mexico toward southeastern Louisiana, then forecast to slow and bend westward along the northern Gulf Coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch in effect Sabine Pass TX to Morgan City LA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City LA to Mouth of Pearl River MS (east of Beaumont)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Upper Texas coast near Sabine Pass, all of Louisiana, Mississippi and Alabama coasts
weather_observation.storm_surge_above_3_feet: Yes (NHC surge forecast 2–4 ft for Sabine Pass area)
weather_observation.wind: Intermittent tropical-storm-force gusts (30–40 mph) possible late Monday night through Tuesday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Water rises 2–4 ft above ground possible near Sabine Lake and lower Neches River, producing minor coastal flooding at the port complex
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches with locally higher totals could cause short-term roadway and yard flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Very rough seas and dangerous rip currents in approaches; brief tornado threat cannot be ruled out Tuesday
